comments.body:
Could you manually package the `license_file` and raise an issue in the upstream repo to get the license included in future releases (by adding the appropriate `MANIFEST.in`)?

https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually
Thanks. I pushed what I think will do it. And I'll do a PR for the recipe in their repo to fix this.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  home: https://github.com/Bernhard10/logging_exceptions
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'Self-logging exceptions: Attach log messages to exceptions and output them conditionally.'
  dev_url: https://github.com/Bernhard10/logging_exceptions
